description: Lo-fi early-80s digital voice with adjustable bit depth and sample rate; add modulation for gritty, chorused repeats.
rangeNote: Bit Depth 6–24 bit; Sample Rate 8–48 kHz; modulation depth via TWEEZ.

description: Two gritty digital lines panned left/right with independent time for the B line; Crossfeed blends the lines for swirling center wash.

tweak.label: Delay Time B
tweak.behaviorCCW: Shorter Delay B time / tighter echoes
tweak.behaviorCW: Longer Delay B time / spaced echoes

tweez.label: Crossfeed Amount
tweez.behaviorCW: Heavy crossfeed and smeared center image

rangeNote: Set Delay A time with TIME or note divisions; TWEAK sets Delay B time.

description: Eight-step Euclidean sequence that evenly places repeats; rotate shifts the pattern forward while repeats set total cycles.

tweak.label: Step Fill
tweak.behaviorCW: More fills until every step fires

tweez.label: Rotate
tweez.behaviorCW: Pattern rotated forward through the steps

rangeNote: Step Fill 1-8; Rotate offsets the filled steps within the 8-step grid.

inspiration: Line 6 original dual discrete stereo delay.
description: Two fully independent L/R delays—TIME sets left, TWEAK sets right; TWEEZ sets right feedback for true dual paths.
rangeNote: Left time via TIME/SUBDIV (with note divisions). Right time can also use note divisions; right repeats via TWEEZ.

description: Intelligent triad repeats that follow your key; pick a key then choose one of eight pitch modes for arpeggiated cascades.

tweak.label: Key
tweak.behaviorCCW: Keys A through G# (chromatic) low to high
tweak.behaviorCW: Keys A through G# (chromatic) low to high

inspiration: Based on the Maestro EP-3 solid-state Echoplex.
description: Solid-state Echoplex flavor with tape saturation; lower headroom adds grit, while wow & flutter plus darker tone live on TWEEZ.

tweak.label: Headroom
tweak.behaviorCCW: Lower headroom / more saturation and compression

tweez.label: Wow & Flutter / Tone
tweez.behaviorCCW: Tighter repeats with more top end
tweez.behaviorCW: More wobble and darker, aged tape tone

rangeNote: Headroom roughly -15.2dB to +8.8dB; wow/flutter increases as tone darkens toward max.
notes: Classic EP-3 style preamp feel with tape wobble.

description: Pristine, low-color digital delay with optional chorus; great for crystal-clear repeats that can be gently animated.
rangeNote: Clean digital voice with modulation available via TWEAK/TWEEZ.

description: Slices incoming audio and sequences the pieces with octaves, reverse, and randomization for instrument-like chaos.

tweez.label: Time Randomness
tweez.behaviorCW: Max slice feedback, frequent drift and shuffle

rangeNote: REPEATS sets overall repeats; TWEEZ simultaneously increases slice feedback, sequence drift, and shuffle probability.

description: Delay line that runs through a moving filter; sweep position and resonance determine how pronounced the sweep gets.
rangeNote: Pairs well with moderate REPEATS for synthy movement.

description: Each repeat is pitch-shifted by interval and cents for cascading rises or falls; Mix lets you balance pitch vs. straight delay.

tweez.label: Mix (Pitch/Delay)
tweez.behaviorCCW: More dry delay vs. pitched voice

rangeNote: Interval -13 to +13 semitones; cents -50 to +50.

description: Plays your phrases back backward; set MIX wet for pure reverse or blend for ghosted trails with modulation.
rangeNote: Delay time via TIME/SUBDIV; modulation speed ~0.05–9.4 Hz, depth 0–100%.

inspiration: Inspired by multi-head magnetic drum echoes (Echorec style).
description: Magnetic drum echo with selectable virtual heads and natural drift; dial in head selection and amount of mechanical wander.
rangeNote: Head Select picks virtual playback head; drift introduces off-speed character.

inspiration: Based on a Ben Adrian–modded Boss DM-2 analog delay.
description: Warm bucket-brigade delay stretched to 1.8s with added modulation; sits easily under the dry signal.
rangeNote: Extended BBD-style delay time with optional modulation.

inspiration: Based on the TC Electronic 2290 Dynamic Digital Delay.
description: Ducking delay that tucks repeats under your playing and lifts them in the gaps; Threshold sets trigger point, Release controls recovery.

tweez.label: Release
tweez.behaviorCCW: Faster release back to full level

rangeNote: Threshold roughly -20 to -60 dB; Release sets how quickly repeats recover after playing stops.

inspiration: Based on the Roland Space Echo RE-201.
description: Multi-head tape echo with selectable head combos plus wow/flutter and darker feedback tone toward max.
rangeNote: Heads options: 1,2,3,1+3,2+3,1+2+3. Turning TWEEZ right increases wow/flutter and darkens feedback tone.

description: Four-switch Classic Looper; optional echo section with modulation and level controls when desired.
rangeNote: Echo modulation depth via TWEAK; echo level via TWEEZ; TIME/REPEATS still govern looper echo time/feedback.

description: Clean, full-bandwidth digital repeats that stay out of the way—perfect when you want the pristine DL4 sound.
rangeNote: EQ the repeats with Bass/Treble; time set by TIME/SUBDIV.

description: DL4 digital delay with a built-in chorus/vibrato section to add motion to otherwise pristine repeats.
rangeNote: Use for subtle chorus or seasick wobble on digital repeats.

inspiration: Inspired by the Binson EchoRec multi-head drum.
description: Psychedelic drum-style echo with wow/flutter and drive to mimic the Binson platter tone.
rangeNote: Multi-head flavor with tone shaped by wobble and drive.

description: Delay into a resonant filter sweep for synthy motion; set position and resonance to taste.
rangeNote: Combine with Tap divisions for rhythmic filter sweeps.

description: Early-digital inspired delay where you can drop bit depth and filter the repeats for gritty textures.
rangeNote: Low-pass filter approx 0.3–12 kHz; resolution from 6-bit to 24-bit.

inspiration: Inspired by Maestro EP-1 tube Echoplex.
description: Tube-style tape echo with controllable wobble and preamp drive for vintage grit.
rangeNote: Classic EP-1 feel; mix REPEATS for runaway feedback.

inspiration: Inspired by Roland RE-100 style multi-head tape.
description: Selectable playback head pairs to build rhythmic multi-tap tape echoes with natural drift.
rangeNote: Choose head combinations for tap patterns; wobble inherent.

description: Classic ping-pong delay with controllable spread and depth between left/right channels.
rangeNote: Offset set via TIME; spread widens the L/R swing.

inspiration: Based on the TC Electronic 2290 Dynamic Digital Delay.
description: Original DL4-style ducking delay: repeats stay out of the way while you play and rise when you pause.
rangeNote: Threshold approx -60 to -20 dB; ducking amount 0 to -138 dB.

inspiration: Note A -1 Play Note A# -1 Toggles on each press between Half Speed and Full Speed Note B -1 Stop
description: Note A -1 Play Note A# -1 Toggles on each press between Half Speed and Full Speed Note B -1 Stop
rangeNote: See manual for parameter ranges.

description: Volume-swell generator feeding a lush delay—great for pads and bowed textures.
rangeNote: Built-in swell into delay for ambient beds.

description: Gently saturated analog-voiced delay with drive and tone controls to sit the repeats under your dry signal.
rangeNote: Use Drive/Tone to set how present the repeats feel.

inspiration: Inspired by Deluxe Memory Man–style modulated analog.
description: Analog delay with chorus/vibrato baked in; retains BBD warmth while adding movement.
rangeNote: Dial modulation for gentle shimmer or seasick wobble.

description: Tape-style delay with wobble and drive to emulate aging tape machines.
rangeNote: Great for vintage slap or runaway feedback squeal.

description: Auto-swell into delay for violin-like textures; Attack/Release shape the envelope.
rangeNote: Use MIX and REPEATS for pad-like washes.

inspiration: Control - MIDI CC Messages CC Value Function 9 0-63: Off 64-127: On Classic Looper Mode On/Off 60 0-63: Overdub 64-127: Record Record/Overdub 61 0-63: Stop; 64-127: Play Play/Stop 62 64-127 Play Once 63 0-63: Undo; 64-127: Retdo Undo/Redo the most recent overdub recording 65 0-63: Forward 64-127: Reverse Forward/Reverse 66 0-63: Full; 64-127: Half Full Speed/Half Speed TIP: You can also utilize MIDI CCs to control the Classic Looper’s built-in Echo parameters while in Classic Looper mode—see the table within "Controlling Parameters" on page 51 .
description:
=== PAGE 54 ===

54 Additional Resources Product Specifications DL4 MkII Specifications Delays 30 Reverbs 15 Looper Yes, with both a 4-Switch and 1-Switch Looper user interface Mono/Stereo Mono or stereo input and output USB USB-C port - for potential future firmware updates and USB MIDI control via computer SD Card 1 x microSD card slot - for expanded Looper memory Audio Inputs 2 x 1/4" unbalanced Left (mono) and Right, Instrument level, Impedance = 1 MΩ, Max input level = +11.25 dBu (8Vpp) 1 x XLR Mic In, with preamp Audio Outputs 2 x 1/4" unbalanced Left (mono) and Right, Instrument level, Impedance = 100 Ohms MIDI MIDI 5-pin IN and OUT/THRU USB MIDI In and OUT/THRU - for use via computer applications Power Requirements 9VDC, 500mA, center pin negative, 2.1 mm. It is recommended to use the included power adapter Dimensions (H x W x D) 2 x 9.25 x 4.5 inches / 5.1 x 23.5 x 11.4 cm Weight 2.03 lbs. / .92 kg All specifications subject to change. Online Resources Looking for more info? We’ve got plenty of online resources, just a click away: • See our DL4 MkII tutorial videos at line6.com/meet-dl4mkii . • Download additional Help documentation covering DL4 MkII and all other Line 6 gear at Line 6 Product Manuals • Check out the Line 6 Support page for access to helpful tips, videos, discussion forums, or to contact Line 6 Technical Support • Can’t get enough Line 6 Gear & accessories? Head on over to the Line 6 Store

®
rangeNote: See manual for parameter ranges.

description: Tight room ambience to add liveliness without a long tail.
rangeNote: Predelay 0–200ms; TWEEZ sets delay/reverb routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Huge, modulated space that blooms into a cinematic wash—perfect for soaring chords.
rangeNote: Mod Mix/Intensity 0–100%; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Lush reverb layered with pitch-shifted particles; three Conditions move from stable to chaotic.
rangeNote: Condition sets stability; TWEEZ sets routing.

description: Cathedral-sized shimmer with octave-up choir-like bloom.
rangeNote: Intensity/mix on TWEAK; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Massive subterranean space with long natural reflections.
rangeNote: Predelay 0–200ms; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Reverb that ducks under your playing and swells back on gaps; Threshold and Release set the ride.
rangeNote: Predelay 0–200ms; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Smooth, full plate-style reverb that flatters most sources.
rangeNote: Predelay 0–200ms; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Deep, modulated plate reverb for lush ambience without shimmer.
rangeNote: Mod depth 0–100%; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Dynamic reverb that responds to playing with threshold and release for bloom or control.

tweak.label: Threshold
tweak.behaviorCW: Higher threshold (stays out of the way)

rangeNote: Use for controlled tails that follow your touch; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Two reflective tanks blended for a wide stereo wash; predelay shapes initial gap.
rangeNote: Predelay 0–200ms; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Ethereal reverb with pitch-shifted sheen riding above the tail.
rangeNote: Shimmer mix via TWEAK; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Blooming, modulated reverb inspired by Helix Glitz—lush tails that expand over time.
rangeNote: Mod depth 0–100%; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Grand hall ambience with long, smooth decay.
rangeNote: Predelay 0–200ms; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Swirling, textural reverb that layers feedback-like textures with the Texture control.
rangeNote: Texture blends tonal complexity; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Organic, evolving reverb that adds movement via the Texture control—great for pads.
rangeNote: Texture adjusts tonal movement; TWEEZ sets routing.
notes: In reverb mode, MIX controls reverb mix and REPEATS controls decay.

description: Disables the secret reverb block entirely.
rangeNote: Use to kill reverb; routing still available for delay-only use.
notes: Select to run delay with no added reverb.
